video_name: 常规情况_冯小刚_2_英文_口播_特别快_中年女声_1.mp4
prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A middle-aged man with a closely cropped haircut and a calm, composed demeanor stands indoors, speaking with expressive animation as he turns his head deliberately through a sequence of positions. The scene shows an East Asian man, likely in his late 40s to early 50s, wearing a dark formal suit jacket over a crisp white collared shirt. His skin tone is warm under soft stage lighting, and his facial features carry a quiet intensity as he engages with the audience. The background is softly blurred, suggesting a public venue or theater setting with warm ambient tones and indistinct figures in the distance. He begins by facing forward, then slowly rotates his head to the side with a measured grace, maintaining eye contact with different points in space as if addressing multiple listeners. His lips move fluidly and expressively as he speaks with volume and clarity, conveying emotion through their dynamic motion without haste. As he turns back to face forward, his hands rise gently to chest level, palms open and fingers relaxed, enhancing his speech with subtle, deliberate gestures. His posture remains upright yet unhurried, radiating confidence and presence. The camera holds steady at eye level, capturing his upper torso and facial expressions with precision, emphasizing the rhythm of his movements and the natural cadence of his delivery. The overall mood is composed and engaging, blending formal presentation with personal warmth.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering, abrupt cuts, and unnatural scene transitions. A deformed, disfigured middle-aged figure with a warped, asymmetrical face, deep unnatural wrinkles, misaligned crooked teeth, and blurred, indistinct features stands in a chaotic indoor setting. His closely cropped haircut appears smudged and pixelated. He wears a dark suit jacket over a white shirt, both rendered with glitchy textures, unnatural folds, and inconsistent lighting. His mouth remains frozen in a single rigid position, never moving or articulating, while his eyes stare blankly without expression. His hands are twisted, fragmented, trembling violently, fingers contorted into impossible shapes, occasionally flickering in and out of frame. His posture is hunched and unstable, shoulders uneven, conveying tension and distortion rather than confidence. The background is a noisy collage of grainy textures, striped patterns, and abstract noise, lacking depth or coherence. Harsh, abnormal lighting casts jagged highlights and deep, unnatural shadows across his face, creating extreme contrast and low-quality visual artifacts. The camera shakes erratically, zooms unpredictably, and cuts abruptly between mismatched angles, breaking the frame’s composition. Motion is jerky, staccato, and devoid of rhythm — no smooth rotation, only spasmodic head twitches and sudden freezes. The entire scene is an unrealistic, low-resolution 3D animation with cartoonish exaggerations, heavy grain, logo overlays, and text artifacts, emphasizing digital corruption over human presence.
